title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 69.4 - Control records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 69.4 - Control records

State Regulations
(a) Records must
be maintained on a current basis which shall show the inventories of alcoholic
beverages stored in warehouses by such licensee and set forth in the form
prescribed in subdivision (b) of section
69.3
the following information: (1)
the quantities and types of alcoholic
beverages delivered to each of the separately licensed premises operated by
such licensee; (2)
the quantities
and types of alcoholic beverages transferred between any of the several
separately licensed premises and/or the warehouse; (3)
the dates of each such delivery or
transfer; (4)
any other disposition
of alcoholic beverages including returns and breakage. (b) A subsidiary control record conforming to
the foregoing must also be maintained for each of the several separately
licensed premises. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
69.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
